response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance your business operations and profitability. Given its exceptional value and the benefits it offers, we are confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.

We are offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $950,000, a significant discount compared to the market value of $1,200,000. This offer is designed to provide you with an attractive entry point into utilizing this product while also allowing us to maximize its value.

Please consider this offer carefully. Should you decide to proceed, we are prepared to facilitate a smooth transaction and ensure a seamless integration of the product into your operations. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

Thank you for considering our product. We look forward to the possibility of working with you.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
